Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Client.Client
public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
The client handles the opening of the desired interface and than handles the connection to the server

Attributes:

  • String "serverAddress": address of the server to connect to
  • int "serverPort": port of the server to connect to
  • String "user": name of the user who joined the server (same as player name)
  • UserInteraction "userInteraction": contains the View's Game and various methods to play
  • Debugger "DEBUGGER": debugger used for this specific class
  • boolean "cheatMode": set to true if the Client is in cheat mode

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Launches the client, if a command line argument "--cli" or "--CLI" is provided the game is started in CLI mode, otherwise in GUI
      Parameters:
      args - Command Line Arguments

    • startUp

      public void startUp()
      Once the user is able to interact with the game this method is called to try to establish a connection with the server for both listening and writing on the socket

    • startUp

      public java.util.ArrayList startUp​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> objects)
      Sets up the connection once the Player has input server and port in the Gui application
      Parameters:
      objects - the server and the port
